intent_atoms.description: Eliminate DocC and Swift compilation warnings emitted while building ISOInspector documentation so the doc archive can be generated cleanly and the documentation site preserves credibility for downstream reviewers.
DocC build completes without warnings originating from ISOInspector repositories (FoundationUI, ISOInspectorKit, ISOInspectorApp).
Compiler warnings tied to @ViewBuilder misuse are eliminated.
External package warnings are documented (if unavoidable) so CI filters know what remains.
DocC build must not emit unresolved symbol links for project-owned modules.
Documentation articles link only to valid symbols and tutorials render cleanly.
Export all FoundationUI modifiers that documentation referenced (BadgeChipStyle, CardStyle, InteractiveStyle, SurfaceStyle) and reword cross-target doc links to avoid unresolved symbol warnings.
Modernize ISOInspectorApp documentation by updating tutorial steps to use DocC-supported directives and adding a table-of-contents with a bundle image.
Fix SwiftUI result-builder warning in SettingsPanelView by removing explicit returns and AnyView wrapping.

functional_units.name: DocC Build Process
functional_units.description: Command or Xcode action that compiles documentation archives for ISOInspectorKit, FoundationUI, and ISOInspectorApp-macOS.

functional_units.name: Swift Compilation of ISOInspectorApp-macOS
functional_units.description: Build phase that compiles Swift source files, including SettingsPanelView, emitting compiler warnings.

functional_units.name: DocC Symbol Link Validation
functional_units.description: Mechanism that checks referenced symbols in documentation (e.g., BadgeChipStyle) against exported API surface to prevent unresolved symbol warnings.

functional_units.name: SwiftUI @ViewBuilder Usage Enforcement
functional_units.description: Rule or lint that ensures @ViewBuilder blocks do not contain explicit return statements or AnyView wrappers, eliminating related compiler warnings.

functional_units.name: DocC Tutorial Syntax Validation
functional_units.description: Parser that validates tutorial directives (e.g., Step(title:)) against supported DocC syntax to avoid syntax warnings.

functional_units.name: Documentation Article Structure Management
functional_units.description: Process for organizing and formatting documentation articles, including topics, sections, and link lists to satisfy DocC formatting rules.

functional_units.name: External Package Warning Suppression
functional_units.description: Feature that allows selective suppression of DocC warnings originating from third‑party SourcePackages such as Yams and NestedA11yIDs.

functional_units.name: Documentation Build Test Automation
functional_units.description: Automated test that runs xcodebuild docbuild to verify warning-free documentation generation.

functional_units.name: Swift Package Build Test Automation
functional_units.description: Automated test that builds ISOInspectorKit or FoundationUI packages to ensure source code compiles without errors.
